mapper.insert: insert into fund_trans_list (user_id, trans_no, pay_no, kind, income_kind, trans_date, trans_amt, remark, trans_time, trans_fee) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{transFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update fund_trans_list set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trans_no = #{transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_no = #{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kind = #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, income_kind = #{incomeKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_date = #{transDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_amt = #{transAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_time = #{transTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trans_fee = #{transFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where fund_trans_list_id = #{fundTransListId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select fund_trans_list_id, user_id, trans_no, pay_no, kind, income_kind, trans_date, trans_amt, remark, trans_time, trans_fee from fund_trans_list where fund_trans_list_id = #{fundTransListId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select fund_trans_list_id, user_id, trans_no, pay_no, kind, income_kind, trans_date, trans_amt, remark, trans_time, trans_fee from fund_trans_list
